description: Returns all tools matching ay least one of the provided tool selection.

functions.label: isAgentNotFoundError
description: Checks if the given error is a {@link OnechatInternalError}

description: Checks if the given error is a {@link OnechatInternalError}

description: Check if a given {@link ToolSelection} is a {@link ByIdsToolSelection}

functions.label: isConversationNotFoundError
description: Checks if the given error is a {@link OnechatConversationNotFoundError}

interfaces.label: AgentDescriptor
description: Base descriptor for an agent.

children.label: id
description: Id of the agent

children.label: name
description: Human-readable name for the agent.

children.label: description
description: Human-readable description for the agent.

children.label: customInstructions
description: Custom instructions that should be added to the prompts when calling the LLM.

children.label: toolSelection
description: Tool selection for this profile, using the {@link ToolSelection} format.

children.label: createdAt
description: Creation date

children.label: updatedAt
description: Last update date.

interfaces.label: AssistantResponse
description: Represents the final answer from the agent in a conversation round.

children.label: message
description: The text message from the assistant.

interfaces.label: ByIdsToolSelection
description:
Represents a tool selection based on individual tool IDs, and optionally a provider ID.

The '*' wildcard can be used for ID selection, to inform that all tools should be selected.

children.label: provider
description: The id of the provider to select tools from

children.label: toolIds
description: List of individual tool ids to select.

interfaces.label: ConversationRound
description:
Represents a round in a conversation, containing all the information
related to this particular round.

children.label: userInput
description: The user input that initiated the round

children.label: steps
description: List of intermediate steps before the end result, such as tool calls

children.label: assistantResponse
description: The final response from the assistant

children.label: messageId
description: ID of the message this chunk is bound to

children.label: textChunk
description: chunk (text delta)

children.label: messageId
description: ID of the message

children.label: messageContent
description: full text content of the message

interfaces.label: OnechatEvent
description: Base type for all onechat events

children.label: type
description: Unique type identifier for the event.

children.label: data
description: Data bound to this event.

children.label: reasoning
description: plain text reasoning content

children.label: round
description: round that was completed

interfaces.label: RoundInput
description: Represents a user input that initiated a conversation round.

children.label: message
description: A text message from the user.

interfaces.label: StructuredAgentIdentifier
description: Structured representation of an agent identifier.

children.label: agentId
description: The unique ID of this agent, within its provider

children.label: providerId
description: Unique ID of the provider this agent is coming from

interfaces.label: StructuredToolIdentifier
description: Structured representation of a tool identifier.

children.label: toolId
description: The unique ID of this tool, relative to the source

children.label: providerId
description: The type of source the tool is being provided from, e.g. builtIn or MCP

interfaces.label: ToolCallWithResult
description: Represents a tool call with the corresponding result.

children.label: toolCallId
description: Id of the tool call, as returned by the LLM

children.label: toolId
description: Structured identifier of the tool.

children.label: args
description: Arguments the tool was called with.

children.label: result
description: Result of the tool, serialized as string.

interfaces.label: ToolDescriptor
description:
Serializable representation of a tool, without its handler or schema.

Use as a common base for browser-side and server-side tool types.

children.label: id
description: A unique id for this tool.

children.label: description
description: The description for this tool, which will be exposed to the LLM.

children.label: meta
description: Meta associated with this tool

interfaces.label: ToolDescriptorMeta
description:
Metadata associated with a tool.

Some of them are specified by the tool owner during registration,
others are automatically added by the framework.

children.label: providerId
description: ID of the provider this tool is exposed from.

children.label: tags
description:
Optional list of tags attached to this tool.
For built-in tools, this is specified during registration.

enums.label: AgentMode
description: Execution mode for agents.

enums.label: OnechatErrorCode
description: Code to identify onechat errors

misc.label: allToolsSelection
description: Constant tool selection to select all tools

misc.label: allToolsSelectionWildcard
description: "all tools" wildcard which can be used for {@link ByIdsToolSelection}

misc.label: builtinToolProviderId
description: The singleton providerId used for all builtIn tools.

misc.label: ChatEvent
description: All types of events that can be emitted from the chat API.

misc.label: ConversationRoundStep
description: Defines all possible types for round steps.

misc.label: esqlToolProviderId
description: The singleton providerId used for all Esql tools.

misc.label: FieldTypes
description: Common ES Field Types

misc.label: OnechatAgentNotFoundError
description: Error thrown when trying to retrieve or execute a tool not present or available in the current context.

misc.label: OnechatBadRequestError
description: Represents a generic bad request error

misc.label: OnechatConversationNotFoundError
description: Error thrown when trying to retrieve or execute a tool not present or available in the current context.

misc.label: oneChatDefaultAgentId
description: ID of the onechat default conversational agent

misc.label: OnechatError
description: Base error class used for all onechat errors.

misc.label: OnechatInternalError
description: Represents an internal error

misc.label: OnechatToolNotFoundError
description: Error thrown when trying to retrieve or execute a tool not present or available in the current context.

misc.label: PlainIdToolIdentifier
description: Represents a plain toolId, without source information attached to it.

misc.label: SerializedAgentIdentifier
description:
String representation of {@link StructuredAgentIdentifier}
Follow a `{providerId}:{agentId}` format.

misc.label: SerializedToolIdentifier
description:
String representation of {@link StructuredToolIdentifier}
Follow a `{toolId}||{sourceType}||{sourceId}` format.

misc.label: ToolIdentifier
description: Defines all possible shapes for a tool identifier.

misc.label: ToolSelection
description: All possible subtypes for tool selection - for now there is only one.

misc.label: unknownToolProviderId
description: Unknown sourceId used from converting plain Ids to structured or serialized ids.

objects.label: BuiltinTags
description: Common set of tags used for platform tools.

children.label: retrieval

objects.label: BuiltinToolIds
description: Ids of built-in onechat tools

objects.label: oneChatAgentProviderIds
description: IDs of the onechat default agent providers.

objects.label: OnechatErrorUtils
description: Global utility exposing all error utilities from a single export.
